headline: T-Mobile Makes Text to 911 Available Off-Grid to Any Wireless User with a Compatible Smartphone — even Verizon and AT&T Customers
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., November 05, 2025--Because emergencies don’t care who your wireless provider is, T-Mobile (NASDAQ: TMUS) is making sure 911 access is available to as many people as possible. Starting today, anyone with a compatible phone can sign up to use T-Mobile Text to 911 through satellite in the 500,000 square miles of the U.S. not reached by traditional cell towers. Now, along with Text to 911 services available via terrestrial cell towers, wireless users in remote areas without traditio

thumbnail.caption: T-Satellite with Starlink brings wireless users 911 access to places where voice calls aren't possible

headline: Data Center Deployment Spending Strategic Business Analysis Report 2025-2030 with Focus on 45+ Key Players Such as AT&T, Cisco Systems, Digital Realty Trust, Equinix, and Google
summary: The key market opportunities in global datacenter deployment spending include the rising need for expanded digital infrastructure driven by AI, IoT, and cloud computing. Growth is fueled by edge computing, energy-efficient technologies, and hybrid environments, with high demand in sectors like finance, healthcare, and retail. headline: Tutor Perini Reports Strong Third Quarter 2025 Results; Further Raises 2025 Adjusted EPS Guidance
summary: LOS ANGELES, November 05, 2025--Tutor Perini Corporation (the "Company") (NYSE: TPC), a leading civil, building and specialty construction company, today reported strong results for the third quarter of 2025 (see attached tables).
